description: A utility object providing string manipulation functions that delegate to JoinUtils and SplitUtils, focused on joining a LinkedList into a String and splitting a String into a LinkedList.

classes.name: StringUtils
classes.description: A Kotlin object that provides utility methods for string operations, such as join and split, using LinkedList.

methods.name: join
methods.description: Joins elements of a LinkedList into a String using JoinUtils.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a String into a LinkedList using SplitUtils.
